title: Merch in the crypto world sucks
body:
But here comes the GDN to the rescue!

PFPs are all the rage. But there are more complex environments, in which people can show their affiliation to their tribe (coin, DAO, company, interest etc.).

Those require a more complex design approach. Same goes for r/l merch.
This is something we as the GDN can offer. 

I propose a twitter based comms campaign, where have a voting mechanism that gives us max exposure: 

// Tweet 1: Explanation with call to nominate a tribe. Most votes make it to round II
- Contact most votes top down to commit until we have a top 3. 
// Tweet 2: Vote on top 3 (tribes encourage their base)
- Winner tribe pays base fee
- GDN gets to work and designes x digital, y r/l, z phygital pieces.
// Voting on our platform(needs to be shareable) as a drive to store mechanic. Best are being produced/minted

Regarding r/l production - I could set this up as we have the right contacts through Phoebe's work for Adidas and our own brand. With one condition, we don't hire exploitative labour or materials.

Benefits for the tribe: reach, identification
Benefits for us: reach, coin
author: 0x19A23d463b4BE0945C05Ba4e5Aa869adCAa55b08
